issue.title: Specialized registry software freezing
issue.description: The civil registry application (ZivReg Pro) freezes when searching for records older than 2010. Have to force close and restart. Search for recent records works fine.
issue.technical_details: Application becomes unresponsive. CPU usage spikes to 100%. Memory usage normal. Database connection remains active. Log shows query timeout errors after 30 seconds. Database size: 850GB.

resolution.notes: Database index corruption suspected. Coordinating with database administrator for maintenance window.
